name: EtherPoS
description: EtherPOS provides a popular and secure computing platform for ETHERPOS investors by using simple and secure blockchain technology and intends to build an EtherPOS exchange. EtherPOS aims to be a leader in blockchain-based security services by providing high-quality innovative, leading-edge solutions built on a secure infrastructure and developed by leading industry practitioners and partners. EtherPOS validators are being recruited. One of the conditions for becoming a validator is to hold ETPOS tokens. Their job is to confirm new ether coins to be distributed on the network.
